episodes.title: Leader of cultlike Zizians linked to 6 killings ordered held without bail in Maryland
episodes.description:
The leader of a cultlike group known as the Zizians that is linked to six killings has been ordered held without bail, as were two others. Thirty-four-year-old Jack LaSota of Berkeley, California, 32-year-old Michelle Zajko of Media, Pennsylvania, and 26-year-old Daniel Blank of Sacramento, California, appeared in court via video Tuesday. They face charges including trespassing, obstructing and hindering and possession of a handgun in a vehicle. https://abc7ne.ws/3EJw9sR

#news #maryland #california #zizians #crime #abc7news

episodes.title: Police arrest alleged leader of cultlike 'Zizian' group once declared dead in Bay Area
episodes.description:
The apparent leader of a cultlike group called the "Zizians" has been arrested as the group that's promoted anarchist theories like radical veganism is linked to multiple murders, including one in Vallejo. STORY: https://abc7ne.ws/3EJw9sR

#cult #zizians #JackLasota #abc7news

episodes.title: Disturbing details emerge about Bay Area religious sect at center of FBI child sex abuse probe
episodes.description:
New details are being shared with the ABC7 I-Team about a religious sect facing widespread allegations of sexual abuse. They're known as the "Two by Twos," or the "Church With No Name." https://abc7ne.ws/4h27q1d

#fbi #church #religion #investigations #california #abc7news

episodes.title: FBI investigating religious sect operating in Bay Area following alleged child sex abuse
episodes.description:
The FBI is investigating a religious sect that's facing widespread allegations of child sex abuse. They're called the Two by Twos (2x2) or The Church with No Name - and there's a following here in the Bay Area. Here's what the I-Team uncovered about the group. https://abc7ne.ws/4cjIAa7




#church #abuse #2x2 #investigation #abc7news

episodes.title: FROM THE ARCHIVE: Jackie Speier talks about surviving Jonestown massacre in 1978
episodes.description:
43 years ago this week, Rep. Jackie Speier survived being shot five times as part of the Jonestown massacre in the country of Guyana. Watch her full interview from 1978.  https://abc7ne.ws/2YVlI0I

#jackiespeier #jonestown #jimjones

episodes.title: FROM THE ARCHIVE: 25th anniversary of Jonestown massacre in 2003
episodes.description:
This week marks the 42nd anniversary of a mass murder-suicide of than 900 cult members in Jonestown, Guyana. They had ties to the Bay Area, including Congresswoman Jackie Speier who remembered congressman Leo Ryan in this story from November 18, 2003.

Story: https://abc7ne.ws/38UjDon

#jonestown #jonestownmassacre #jonestownanniversary

episodes.title: What Rep. Jackie Speier learned after being shot investigating Jonestown
episodes.description:
"There are so many thoughts that run through your head when you're dying," she said. "And I was 28 years old. I had resigned myself to the fact that I was dying."

For the full story: https://abc7ne.ws/2DRK8wX

episodes.title: Left for dead at Jonestown 40 years ago: Rep. Jackie Speier looks back at the ordeal she survived
episodes.description:
In 1978, Congresswoman Jackie Speier was shot and left for dead in the largest mass murder-suicide in American history. She opened up to ABC7 about the ordeal that haunts her to this day.

For the full story: https://abc7ne.ws/2zEy1PB

episodes.title: Shot and left for dead l Rep. Jackie Speier opens up about surviving Jonestown massacre
episodes.description: In 1978, Congresswoman Jackie Speier, D-Calif., was shot and left for dead in the largest mass murder-suicide in American history. She opened up to ABC7 about the Jonestown massacre and the horrific ordeal that haunts her to this day. Full story here: https://abc7ne.ws/2NOe41b
